title: Searge: 命令方块可能有九种材质
author: obby825
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2015-8-19 10:10 编辑 


Searge: I'm happy with all 9 textures that I made, so I won't tweak them any more. And I still like to use #PaintDotNet for this kind of work.
Searge: 我对于我新制作的9种材质很满意，所以我不会再对它们进行调整了。我使用#PaintDotNet来制作它们。
